title: Indicted Chinese exile controls Gettr social media site, ex-employees say
description: Guo Wengui has previously been described as an investor in the site, which was founded by Trump adviser Jason Miller. But former employees say he really controlled the site.

title: Popular apps with Chinese ties can gather more data than TikTok
description: Everything VPNs hide, such as a user’s physical location, they can see themselves. There are no regulations governing what becomes of that information.

title: AI can draw hands now. That’s bad news for deep-fakes.
description: AI image-makers have been notoriously bad at rendering hands. Now, they’re getting better and could make deep fakes harder to spot.
